plot: President George Bush, the Republican candidate; Governor Bill Clinton, the Democratic candidate; and independent candidate Ross Perot participate in a series of debates as part of the 1992 United States presidential campaign.
plot_en: President George Bush, the Republican candidate; Governor Bill Clinton, the Democratic candidate; and independent candidate Ross Perot participate in a series of debates as part of the 1992 United States presidential campaign.
plot_es: President George Bush, the Republican candidate; Governor Bill Clinton, the Democratic candidate; and independent candidate Ross Perot participate in a series of debates as part of the 1992 United States presidential campaign.
title: 1992 Presidential Debates
